definition: to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: In the arms of a suspect was arrested near the burial.
sentences.chinese: 一可疑人物在武器埋藏地附近被逮捕。

sentences.english: The estimated time of burial was placed in the early Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 埋藏的時間估計在唐朝早期。

sentences.english: The sand buried shallowly may be liquefaction.
sentences.chinese: 埋藏較淺的砂土會發生液化。

sentences.english: Bury your talents, and you get “weeping and gnashing ofteeth.”
sentences.chinese: 埋藏自己的才能，你將“哭泣並咬牙切齒”。

sentences.english: According to a legend the mine hides big fortune.
sentences.chinese: 據傳說礦山裏埋藏着巨大的財富。

sentences.english: He told me that under each cross is buried treasure.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴我每一個交叉點處都有埋藏的寶藏。

sentences.english: Burial dissolution is of great importance in reforming the reservoir physical property .
sentences.chinese: 埋藏溶蝕作用對改善儲層物性起到至關重要的作用。

sentences.english: FOR many Japanese the boom years are still seared on their memories.
sentences.chinese: 許多日本人心中仍埋藏着全盛時期的美好記憶。

sentences.english: The fourth is deep-burying stage, which is dominated by destruction.
sentences.chinese: 第四階段爲深埋藏階段，以破壞作用爲主。

sentences.english: They stashed the guns away under the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他們把那批槍埋藏在地下了。

sentences.english: The true words, he said, were "imbedded as diamonds in dunghills."
sentences.chinese: 他說，真言“就像糞堆裏的鑽石一樣被埋藏着”。

sentences.english: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth, and hid his lord's money.
sentences.chinese: 但那領一千的，去掘開地，把主人的銀子埋藏了。

sentences.english: Eodiagenesis is characterized by the assemblage of carbonate-analcime-anhydrite, while authigenic kaolinite is found in some strata.
sentences.chinese: 淺埋藏期以碳酸鹽～沸石～硬石膏組合爲特徵。

sentences.english: There is always a confession buried beneath thousands of words.
sentences.chinese: 在千萬語言之下，縂埋藏著一句懺悔似的告白。

sentences.english: Before the burial, there was a long trek by donkey or mule.
sentences.chinese: 經過驢騾的長途馱運，纔到達埋藏地點。

sentences.english: It's not like the web is burying the archive any deeper.
sentences.chinese: web不像是把存檔埋藏地更深。

definition: to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
hidden beneath the surface/buried and concealed
to hold in store/to contain (untapped reserves etc)
precious mineral deposits/hidden treasure/(fig.) treasure/(Buddhism) the treasure of Buddha's law
to cover up/to conceal/to go into hiding
covered in dust/dusty/lying unused for a long time
